# ContractDeployer class

Handles deploying new contracts

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ContractDeployer extends RPCConnectionHandler
```

**Extends:** RPCConnectionHandler

## Constructors

| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [(constructor)(network, options, storage)](./sdk.contractdeployer._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>ContractDeployer</code> class |
